title: T. De Witt Talmage; As I Knew Him
author: Talmage, Eleanor McCutcheon
snippet: Dr. John Hall of the Fifth Avenue Church received thesalary of $30,000, Dr. Paxton $10,000, Dr. Parkhurst and Dr. C.C.Thompson $8,000 respectively. Dr. Robert Collyer of the Park AvenueUnitarian Church, received $10,000, and Dr. William M. Taylor of theBroadway Tabernacle the same amount.

title: Travels in Europe and Northern Africa.
author: Rose, W. G.
snippet: ^^ HE tour of the Literary Digest Part}^ was inaugurated X by a banquet at the Park Avenue Hotel, New York, ^^
